eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.quests

Class QuestMenuItems

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.quests.QuestMenuItems

  • public class QuestMenuItems
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to create quest related menu items for different menus.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • generateQuest

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack generateQuest(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                           java.lang.String questName,
                                                           int phase,
                                                           org.bukkit.Material colorMaterial)
        Creates an item stack, containing information about a running quest. If it is not a main quest, an option to cancel the quest, will be added to the lore.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is doing the quest.
        questName - The name of the quest.
        phase - The current quest phase.
        colorMaterial - The material of the item stack.
        Returns:
        The quest item stack.
        See Also:
        WauzQuest.getDisplayName(), QuestRequirementChecker.getItemStackLores()

      • generateEmptyQuest

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack generateEmptyQuest(java.lang.String type)
        Creates an item stack, that represents a free quest slot, that isn't bound to any quest. Used for showing free slots in the quest overview menu.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the quest, for showing in the display name.
        Returns:
        The quest item stack.

      • generateUnacceptedQuest

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack generateUnacceptedQuest(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                                     WauzQuest quest,
                                                                     int phase,
                                                                     boolean trackable)
        Creates an item stack, containing information about an unstarted quest. Can be trackable for showing in the quest finder, or not, for showing in a dialog.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is viewing the quest.
        quest - The unaccepted quest.
        phase - The displayed quest phase.
        trackable - If the quest can be tracked.
        Returns:
        The quest item stack.
        See Also:
        WauzQuest.getDisplayName(), QuestRequirementChecker.getItemStackLoresUnaccepted()

      • generateCompletedQuest

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack generateCompletedQuest(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                                    WauzQuest quest)
        Creates an item stack, containing information about a finished quest. Contains information about scaled quest rewards.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is viewing the quest.
        quest - The unaccepted quest.
        Returns:
        The quest item stack.

      • getInformationSection

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInformationSection(WauzQuest quest)
        Creates a information section, to display in quest item lores.
        Parameters:
        quest - The quest to show.
        Returns:
        The generated information section.

      • getRewardSection

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRewardSection(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                                 WauzQuest quest)
        Creates a reward section, including bonus multipliers, to display in quest item lores.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is viewing the quest.
        quest - The quest to show.
        Returns:
        The generated reward section.
